about_the_game:
"LUNA! You have to stop dozing off like that! We will NEVER reach the Halloween at this pace!
Plus, you are going to get a concussion and slow us down!!"

You babbled "Halloween" in your sleep, so now you have to find whatever that is...
Jump over annoying obstacles, but you can also freeze them!
AND find some more funky things!

  • Talk to some strange characters...
  • Find charming and surreal places.....
  • Jump around annoying obstacles.........
  • Freeze those annoying obstacles...............
  • Try toggling the Chili Pepper Mode.................
  • Find whatever the "Halloween" is...............................

In this 3D platformer, Luna can freeze certain obstacles! Jumping off a frozen platform launches Luna even further!
This strange adventure lets you play at your own pace. But there's a faster Chili Pepper Mode...
Activate Chili Pepper Mode to become a lot faster, but also uncontrollably jumpy!
It can make things more difficult, but also more exciting! 

Luna's bound to meet some strange characters along the way - Everything should be fine with the help of Funky... Right??

The Digital Domain??? When did I accept that anyway??
That sounds awful… What even is Halloween??

Dive into this funky world for free!

name: Funky Panic Attack

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 or later (64bit)
  • Processor: 64-bit Dual Core or greater
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DX11 capable
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Window 10 or Windows 11 (64bit)
  • Processor: Intel i3-12100F | AMD Ryzen 5 3600
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1650 | RX 570
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 10 GB available space

short_description: Can Luna navigate this funky world to find Halloween? - Talk to strange and compelling characters! Freeze obstacles and activate the fast Chili Pepper Mode, but beware - it also makes you uncontrollably jumpy!
